Html:
Hello,
We use the PHPExcel here in the company,
Recently realized that in Excel 2013 the charts simply do not appear when opening a message appears saying the file is corrupted.

The strange thing is that in my development environment, I can generate the files to open normally.

Has anyone experienced this?

Thank you!

Kelvin

I have experienced the same issue. I have an Excel document with Charts and I use PHPExcel to update the data. When opening the document back into Excel the worksheet is either corrupted or some of the charts have been removed.

Have you learned anything more?

Thanks.
Gordon
